about_the_game:
Get ready to fight in this fast-paced multiplayer fps game! Volunteers is a two-team-based shooter where you join a game with your friends and try to find your way to the victory.

You are part of an experiment where your behavior will be evaluated.
Do you play with your team?
Are you gonna play for kills or for the win?
Are you gonna share your resources or not?
Are you gonna try to find strategies or not?
We'll find out... you are a volunteer...

In this game, each match will be a unique experience where you need to explore different maps and environments to find anything that could help you to survive. Loot for weapons, healing or shield. When you are ready (and so is your team?), find the other team and get rid of it. Can't find the enemies? Try to secure the round by capturing the objective! But be careful, someone might be looking at you, silently waiting for you, to try this exact move!

Choose a skin, find your friends and join a fun match!

You are waiting for a match? Join the shooting range to improve your skills!

Follow the development of the game by watching the entertaining devlogs on Youtube.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: AMD Zen 2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for Vulkan Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Volunteers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz 64bit Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for Vulkan Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Are you ready? You are VOLUNTEERS! You are part of an experiment! Fight, survive and either WIN or LOSE, all of this is up to you and your team. In this fast-paced multiplayer fps, you will have to try to find your way to the victory.
